title: Looking for 3v3 Twisted Treeline team. Offering Skin Rewards upon reaching Gold.
body:
Alright so I' m sick of random luck in solo Q. I want a team, hopefully one with teamspeak/curse. I want to find players that want to make it to gold.

However I haven't had much luck in the past recruiting, so perhaps an incentive is in order? If I get to gold I'll buy a skin for team members, it can be literally any skin that I'm able to gift you or get to your account.

So perhaps this might work? I dunno, but add me, my in game name is Stone Duelist

Feel free to ask me any questions.

replies.body: I play a supp role, i can go almost any champ, but i like being the tanky champ that takes most damage and ccs while my teamates poke
I am down, i played ranked last season and ended up gold for most of the season

You can add me and I will do my best to help. Gold 2 currently, played lots of TT. If im on, i will play.

CPT Commando

I'm looking for a 3v3 team too. 
I main {{champion:75}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:133}}  {{champion:127}}   on TT.
IGN: D4rkghast
plat 5 IGN Feelblitz im down for that
I am eager and wanting to get into gold and also by doing it in ranked 3's i also have curse voice along with skype so yeahh i am ready to learn 3's :)
